1: וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>lifted up</n> יַעֲקֹ֜ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>And Jacob</n> עֵינָ֗יו <sup>5869 </sup> <n>his eyes</n> וַיַּרְא֙ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and looked</n> וְהִנֵּ֣ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> עֵשָׂ֣ו <sup>6215 </sup> <n>and behold Esau</n> בָּ֔א <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> וְעִמּ֕וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> אַרְבַּ֥ע <sup>702 </sup> <n>and with him four</n> מֵא֖וֹת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n> אִ֑ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> וַיַּ֣חַץ <sup>2673 </sup> <n>And he divided</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַיְלָדִ֗ים <sup>3206 </sup> <n>the children</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>among</n> לֵאָה֙ <sup>3812 </sup> <n>unto Leah</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>among</n> רָחֵ֔ל <sup>7354 </sup> <n>and unto Rachel</n> וְעַ֖ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>among</n> שְׁתֵּ֥י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>and unto the two</n> הַשְּׁפָחֽוֹת׃ <sup>8198 </sup> <n>handmaids</n>
2: וַיָּ֧שֶׂם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>And he put</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַשְּׁפָח֛וֹת <sup>8198 </sup> <n>the handmaids</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יַלְדֵיהֶ֖ן <sup>3206 </sup> <n>and their children</n> רִֽאשֹׁנָ֑ה <sup>7223 </sup> <n>foremost</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> לֵאָ֤ה <sup>3812 </sup> <n>and Leah</n> וִֽילָדֶ֙יהָ֙ <sup>3206 </sup> <n>and her children</n> אַחֲרֹנִ֔ים <sup>314 </sup> <n>after</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רָחֵ֥ל <sup>7354 </sup> <n>and Rachel</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יוֹסֵ֖ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>and Joseph</n> אַחֲרֹנִֽים׃ <sup>314 </sup> <n>hindermost</n>
3: וְה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>himself</n> עָבַ֣ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>And he passed over</n> לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before them</n> וַיִּשְׁתַּ֤חוּ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>and bowed himself</n> אַ֙רְצָה֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>to the ground</n> שֶׁ֣בַע <sup>7651 </sup> <n>seven</n> פְּעָמִ֔ים <sup>6471 </sup> <n>times</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> גִּשְׁתּ֖וֹ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>until he came near</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> אָחִֽיו׃ <sup>251 </sup> <n>to his brother</n>
4: וַיָּ֨רָץ <sup>7323 </sup> <n>ran</n> עֵשָׂ֤ו <sup>6215 </sup> <n>And Esau</n> לִקְרָאתוֹ֙ <sup>7125 </sup> <n>to meet him</n> וַֽיְחַבְּקֵ֔הוּ <sup>2263 </sup> <n>and embraced</n> וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>him and fell</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> צַוָּארָ֖ו <sup>6677 </sup> <n>on his neck</n> וַׅיִּׅשָּׁׅקֵ֑ׅהׅוּׅ <sup>5401 </sup> <n>and kissed him</n> וַיִּבְכּֽוּ׃ <sup>1058 </sup> <n>and they wept</n>
5: וַיִּשָּׂ֣א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>And he lifted up</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֵינָ֗יו <sup>5869 </sup> <n>his eyes</n> וַיַּ֤רְא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and saw</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַנָּשִׁים֙ <sup>802 </sup> <n>the women</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַיְלָדִ֔ים <sup>3206 </sup> <n>and the children</n> וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> מִי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> אֵ֣לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>Who [are] those</n> לָּ֑ךְ וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>with thee? And he said</n> הַיְלָדִ֕ים <sup>3206 </sup> <n>The children</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> חָנַ֥ן <sup>2603 </sup> <n>hath graciously given</n> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>which God</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>thy servant</n>
6: וַתִּגַּ֧שְׁןָ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>came near</n> הַשְּׁפָח֛וֹת <sup>8198 </sup> <n>Then the handmaidens</n> הֵ֥נָּה <sup>2007 </sup> <n>with</n> וְיַלְדֵיהֶ֖ן <sup>3206 </sup> <n>they and their children</n> וַתִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶֽיןָ׃ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>and they bowed themselves</n>
7: וַתִּגַּ֧שׁ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>came near</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>likewise</n> לֵאָ֛ה <sup>3812 </sup> <n>And Leah</n> וִילָדֶ֖יהָ <sup>3206 </sup> <n>also with her children</n> וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֑וּ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>and bowed themselves</n> וְאַחַ֗ר <sup>310 </sup> <n>and after</n> נִגַּ֥שׁ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>near</n> יוֹסֵ֛ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>Joseph</n> וְרָחֵ֖ל <sup>7354 </sup> <n>and Rachel</n> וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוֽוּ׃ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>and they bowed</n>
8: וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> מִ֥י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>What</n> לְךָ֛ כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַמַּחֲנֶ֥ה <sup>4264 </sup> <n>What [meanest] thou by all this drove</n> הַזֶּ֖ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> פָּגָ֑שְׁתִּי <sup>6298 </sup> <n>which I met</n> וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>? And he said</n> לִמְצֹא־ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>[These are] to find</n> חֵ֖ן <sup>2580 </sup> <n>grace</n> בְּעֵינֵ֥י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in the sight</n> אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <sup>113 </sup> <n>of my lord</n>
9: וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> עֵשָׂ֖ו <sup>6215 </sup> <n>And Esau</n> יֶשׁ־ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>I have</n> לִ֣י רָ֑ב <sup>7227 </sup> <n>enough</n> אָחִ֕י <sup>251 </sup> <n>my brother</n> יְהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>have</n> לְךָ֖ אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>what</n> לָֽךְ׃
10: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יַעֲקֹ֗ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>And Jacob</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>No</n> נָא֙ <sup>4994 </sup> <n>please</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> נָ֨א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>now</n> מָצָ֤אתִי <sup>4672 </sup> <n>Nay I pray thee if now I have found</n> חֵן֙ <sup>2580 </sup> <n>grace</n> בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in thy sight</n> וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>then receive</n> מִנְחָתִ֖י <sup>4503 </sup> <n>my present</n> מִיָּדִ֑י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>at my hand</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּ֞ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> רָאִ֣יתִי <sup>7200 </sup> <n>for therefore I have seen</n> פָנֶ֗יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>thy face</n> כִּרְאֹ֛ת <sup>7200 </sup> <n>as though I had seen</n> פְּנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>the face</n> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> וַתִּרְצֵֽנִי׃ <sup>7521 </sup> <n>and thou wast pleased with me</n>
11: קַח־ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>Take</n> נָ֤א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Please</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בִּרְכָתִי֙ <sup>1293 </sup> <n>I pray thee my blessing</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> הֻבָ֣את <sup>935 </sup> <n>that is brought</n> לָ֔ךְ כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> חַנַּ֥נִי <sup>2603 </sup> <n>hath dealt graciously with me</n> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>to thee because God</n> וְכִ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>and because</n> יֶשׁ־ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>I have</n> לִי־ כֹ֑ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>enough</n> וַיִּפְצַר־ <sup>6484 </sup> <n>And he urged</n> בּ֖וֹ וַיִּקָּֽח׃ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>him and he took</n>
12: וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> נִסְעָ֣ה <sup>5265 </sup> <n>Let us take our journey</n> וְנֵלֵ֑כָה <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and go</n> וְאֵלְכָ֖ה <sup>1980 </sup> <n>will go</n> לְנֶגְדֶּֽךָ׃ <sup>5048 </sup> <n>before</n>
13: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> אֵלָ֗יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> אֲדֹנִ֤י <sup>113 </sup> <n>unto him My lord</n> יֹדֵ֙עַ֙ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>knoweth</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> הַיְלָדִ֣ים <sup>3206 </sup> <n>that the children</n> רַכִּ֔ים <sup>7390 </sup> <n>[are] tender</n> וְהַצֹּ֥אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>and the flocks</n> וְהַבָּקָ֖ר <sup>1241 </sup> <n>and herds</n> עָל֣וֹת <sup>5763 </sup> <n>with young</n> עָלָ֑י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>care</n> וּדְפָקוּם֙ <sup>1849 </sup> <n>[are] with me and if men should overdrive</n> י֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>day</n> אֶחָ֔ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>them one</n> וָמֵ֖תוּ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>will die</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַצֹּֽאן׃ <sup>6629 </sup> <n>all the flock</n>
14: יַעֲבָר־ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>I pray thee pass over</n> נָ֥א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Please</n> אֲדֹנִ֖י <sup>113 </sup> <n>Let my lord</n> לִפְנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> עַבְדּ֑וֹ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>his servant</n> וַאֲנִ֞י <sup>589 </sup> <n>and I</n> אֶֽתְנָהֲלָ֣ה <sup>5095 </sup> <n>and I will lead on</n> לְאִטִּ֗י <sup>328 </sup> <n>softly</n> לְרֶ֨גֶל <sup>7272 </sup> <n>according as</n> הַמְּלָאכָ֤ה <sup>4399 </sup> <n>the cattle</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>that</n> לְפָנַי֙ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>that goeth before me</n> וּלְרֶ֣גֶל <sup>7272 </sup> <n>be able to endure</n> הַיְלָדִ֔ים <sup>3206 </sup> <n>and the children</n> עַ֛ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>I</n> אָבֹ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>until I come</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אֲדֹנִ֖י <sup>113 </sup> <n>unto my lord</n> שֵׂעִֽירָה׃ <sup>8165 </sup> <n>unto Seir</n>
15: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> עֵשָׂ֔ו <sup>6215 </sup> <n>And Esau</n> אַצִּֽיגָה־ <sup>3322 </sup> <n>Let me now leave</n> נָּ֣א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Please</n> עִמְּךָ֔ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>you</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>some</n> הָעָ֖ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>with thee [some] of the folk</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> אִתִּ֑י <sup>854 </sup> <n>he</n> וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>that [are] with me And he said</n> לָ֣מָּה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>What</n> זֶּ֔ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>me</n> אֶמְצָא־ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>needeth it? let me find</n> חֵ֖ן <sup>2580 </sup> <n>grace</n> בְּעֵינֵ֥י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in the sight</n> אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <sup>113 </sup> <n>of my lord</n>
16: וַיָּשָׁב֩ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>returned</n> בַּיּ֨וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>that day</n> הַה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> עֵשָׂ֛ו <sup>6215 </sup> <n>So Esau</n> לְדַרְכּ֖וֹ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>on his way</n> שֵׂעִֽירָה׃ <sup>8165 </sup> <n>unto Seir</n>
17: וְיַעֲקֹב֙ <sup>3290 </sup> <n>And Jacob</n> נָסַ֣ע <sup>5265 </sup> <n>journeyed</n> סֻכֹּ֔תָה <sup>5523 </sup> <n>to Succoth</n> וַיִּ֥בֶן <sup>1129 </sup> <n>and built</n> ל֖וֹ בָּ֑יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>him an house</n> וּלְמִקְנֵ֙הוּ֙ <sup>4735 </sup> <n>for his cattle</n> עָשָׂ֣ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and made</n> סֻכֹּ֔ת <sup>5521 </sup> <n>booths</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּ֛ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> קָרָ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>is called</n> שֵׁם־ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>therefore the name</n> הַמָּק֖וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>of the place</n> סֻכּֽוֹת׃ <sup>5523 </sup> <n>Succoth</n> ס
18: וַיָּבֹא֩ <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> יַעֲקֹ֨ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>And Jacob</n> שָׁלֵ֜ם <sup>8003 </sup> <n>safely</n> עִ֣יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>a city</n> שְׁכֶ֗ם <sup>7927 </sup> <n>of Shechem</n> אֲשֶׁר֙ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>which [is] in the land</n> כְּנַ֔עַן <sup>3667 </sup> <n>of Canaan</n> בְּבֹא֖וֹ <sup>935 </sup> <n>when he came</n> מִפַּדַּ֣ן אֲרָ֑ם <sup>6307 </sup> <n>from Padanaram</n> וַיִּ֖חַן <sup>2583 </sup> <n>and pitched his tent</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> פְּנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> הָעִֽיר׃ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>the city</n>
19: וַיִּ֜קֶן <sup>7069 </sup> <n>And he bought</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> חֶלְקַ֣ת <sup>2513 </sup> <n>a parcel</n> הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of a field</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>he</n> נָֽטָה־ <sup>5186 </sup> <n>where he had spread</n> שָׁם֙ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n> אָהֳל֔וֹ <sup>168 </sup> <n>his tent</n> מִיַּ֥ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>at the hand</n> בְּנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> חֲמ֖וֹר <sup>2544 </sup> <n>of Hamor</n> אֲבִ֣י <sup>1 </sup> <n>father</n> שְׁכֶ֑ם <sup>7927 </sup> <n>Shechem's</n> בְּמֵאָ֖ה <sup>3967 </sup> <n>for an hundred</n> קְשִׂיטָֽה׃ <sup>7192 </sup> <n>pieces of money</n>
20: וַיַּצֶּב־ <sup>5324 </sup> <n>And he erected</n> שָׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> מִזְבֵּ֑חַ <sup>4196 </sup> <n>there an altar</n> וַיִּ֨קְרָא־ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and called it</n> ל֔וֹ אֵ֖ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>God</n> אֱלֹהֵ֥י <sup>430 </sup> <n>angels</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> ס
